description: The Carenado line of aircraft has been well acclaimed by users and reviewers for many years and for good reason. They are well constructed, looks good and have impeccable behavior in flight. The cockpits are accurate and well equipped.

name: X-Plane 10 Global: Carenado - PA34 200T Seneca II
description: The Carenado line of aircraft has been well acclaimed by users and reviewers for many years and for good reason. They are well constructed, looks good and have impeccable behavior in flight. The cockpits are accurate and well equipped.

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - Batman 75th Anniversary
description: Play as Joker and Harley Quinn, setting up a variety of celebration set pieces. Be the Dark Knight and play as some of the most iconic faces of Batman through the years, including his first appearance in Detective Comics #27.

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - Heroines and Villainesses Character Pack
description: Celebrating the fearless females of DC Comics, this collection of super heroines and villainesses features Raven, Starfire, Batwoman and more!

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - Batman of the Future Character Pack
description: Set in the future, a new hero must rise to defend Gotham City again. Control the new Batman, Terry McGinnis, with his Batsuit that allows him to fly and even turn invisible. Players can also access villains including Blight as well as Joker himself.

name: LEGO The Hobbit: The Battle Pack
description: The land of Middle-earth is full of danger, but the items in our latest pack guarantee you’re prepared for battle. Destroy Morgul LEGO with the Shadow Sword, equip yourself with Jeweled Mithril Armor of the finest Dwarven craftsmanship, or activate the Light Orb Shield for the ultimate protection.

name: Gloom: Unhappy Homes
description: Home is where the heart is buried beneath the floorboards. New cards, new rules, and a new family in this deadly expansion! Make everyone suffer even more.

name: Bear, Vodka, Balalaika: Cyberpunk
description: The year is 2177 takes place in the Night City Arena, obsessed with power, glamour and bright neon signs. The streets are full of cyborgs. You have unlimited ammunition, the main goal is to kill as many enemies as possible and survive.

name: Endless Legend: The Lost Tales
description: The Lost Tales features additional storytelling content for Endless Legend, the critically acclaimed 4X turn-based strategy game, featuring more than 20 new quests which gives players exclusive insights about the game's minor factions.

name: Endless Legend: Forgotten Love Add-on
description: An add-on for Endless Legend, the critically acclaimed 4X turn-based strategy game. Adds Irjsko Lasmak and Bayari Kulaa to cast of heroes. This content was unlocked to celebrate the Make War Not Love 4 community event.

name: Endless Legend: Echoes of Auriga
description: Additional soundtracks for Endless Legend, the critically acclaimed 4X turn-based strategy game, featuring 7 new tracks composed and produced by FlybyNo. Includes exclusive unit equipments inspired by the Echoes of Auriga.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Dante "Beast Mode" Jefferson
description: Charge into the hunt as Dante “Beast Mode” Jefferson, featuring the iconic look and voice lines of the legendary running back Marshawn Lynch.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Dutch '87
description: Play as Major Alan ‘Dutch’ Schaefer with this premium Fireteam character, complete with his iconic voice and look from his first encounter with the Predator in the original 1987 film.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Viking Predator
description: Viking raiders consumed lands far from their own borders, and by doing so managed to draw attention they never imagined.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - City Hunter Predator
description: From the concrete jungle of Los Angeles, emerge from the shadows as the City Hunter – the new premium Predator class from the iconic 1990 film.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Samurai Predator
description: From the hunting grounds of feudal Japan, this demon from legend once hunted skilled warriors who protected their island nation.

name: Senalux: Level Pack 4
description: The 4th Senalux Level Pack adds another 6 Stages with a total of 72 levels and introduces an additional mechanic as well as 4 new optical components.

name: Senalux: Level Pack 3
description: The 3rd Senalux Level Pack adds another 6 Stages with a total of 72 levels and introduces 7 new optical / optoelectrical components.

name: Jagged Alliance Online: Reloaded - Echo
description: Add the resourceful Echo to your mercenary company, permanently! With her ability to spot far away enemies and incredible accuracy she will take out the opposition ninja-style!

name: Jagged Alliance Online: Reloaded - Shadow
description: Let Shadow sneak up on your enemies and take them out quickly and quietly.Downloading the Shadow Pack will add an elite version of Shadow to your team permanently and save you valuable in game cash by skipping the cost for hiring and upkeep. Employ Shadows superior stealth ability to your team and dish out deadly damage!

name: Jagged Alliance Online: Reloaded - Ivan
description: Bolster your ranks with Ivan and blast your enemies with heavy machinegun fire! Downloading the Ivan Pack will add an elite version of Ivan to your team permanently and save you valuable in game cash by skipping the cost for hiring and upkeep. Ivan brings his heavy machinegun with him and will increase your team's firepower massively !

name: Jagged Alliance Online: Reloaded - Raven
description: Get your hands on this deadly and alluring sniper. Downloading the Raven Pack will add an exclusive version of Raven to your team permanently and save you valuable in game cash by skipping the cost for hiring and upkeep. Raven brings her beloved sniper rifle along and is a great addition to any team!

name: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion - Minor Factions
description: Add a whole new strategic dimension with the Minor Factions DLC! Compete against your enemies to exert control over upstart forces that have emerged outside the boundaries of the great powers.

name: Space Mining
description: Space Mining is a game of strategy and deck building! Winning games will give you new cards, and powerful equipments for special bonuses in the match! You can play solo, sharing the screen or play ON-LINE to challenge new opponents or against AI. An innovative gameplay for a brand new card game!

name: Break Sky
description: You received a distress signal from a distance, but when you reached this huge spacecraft, you found no one.

name: What Time Is It
description: In order to get the time without using the extreme, looking for suspicious items around, crack the heavy fog!

name: Cubelz: Cars
description: Heat at full throttle and a new system through the points. That is the motto of the DLC "Cubelz Cars". Let yourself be seduced by lovingly designed levels and heat up between obstacles.

name: Lava Escape Mine
description: Escape the volcanic mine. Red hot magma is now pouring into the underground mining complex. You must escape the mine before the magma catches up to you in virtual reality.

name: Bordercide
description: Witness the story of a detective struggling with mental issues as he chases after a serial killer. In this noir-themed top-down shooter game, you can use your character’s abilities and create your own gameplay style as you progress through levels with a wide variety of enemies.

name: Inside Explorer: The Gilded Lady
description: Inside Explorer: The Gilded Lady DLC offers an epic exploration of a real ancient mummy from the Field Museum's collection.

name: Inside Explorer: Mummy with figurines
description: The scans of this mummified man tells us about late Egyptian burial practices, from the placement of his hands to figurines he was buried with.

name: Tocovix
description: Place Crosses on the game board and complete Shapes. Earn Stops to block your opponents and make your way to victory! Play with your friends on the same device or challenge other players Online.

name: Perfect Decision
description: 「Perfect decision」 is a 2D strategic business simulation game with real estate as its theme. Here, you will choose different types of characters, use different types of companies, recruit different types of employees, and use different means to make profits in different types of cities!

name: Liquidation: Echoes of the Past
description: LIQUIDATION is a tactical RTS in which you take the role of a commander to bring back balance to the war-torn world of Veá.

name: Labyrinthus: Episode 1
description: Can you trust your own memory? Here a maze that you should escape with your survival skils. Find the correct ways, keys ,codes and lastly watch out for evil spirits!

name: Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles - Chapter 3
description: Experience the third chapter in Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles. Directly following the horrific discoveries in the underground laboratory, you'll face an all new story chapter as Lydia continues to fight for survival. Includes additional content for the Battle Mode.

name: Marvel's Wolverine
description: Marvel's Wolverine is a standalone game being directed by Brian Horton (creative director) and Cameron Christian (game director), who led the creative efforts on Marvel’s Spider-Man: Miles Morales. In the vein of the Spider-Man games, the goal is to not only respect the DNA of what makes the character so popular, but also look for opportunities to make it feel fresh and truly reflect the Insomniac spirit.

name: Woom
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic - Remake
description: Sin descripción

name: Gravity in Space
description: Gravity in Space is an acurate-physics-based spacecraft flight and combat simulation. Learn how to use gravitational forces to navigate through surreal worlds, while you outplay your enemies and shoot them.

name: Edge of Elsewhere
description: Guide fledgling alchemist Saskia Hawthorn through her first year at magical university! Craft items, fulfil requests, rub shoulders with the Fae and maybe even date a boy in this otome alchemy dating sim!

name: Light and Embers
description: Relax. Listen to the crackle of the fire and the chirping of the birds. Add a log or two if the fire starts to burn out. Enjoy a calm and stress-free campfire.

name: Ultimate Neural Network
description: Ultimate Neural Network is an interactive 3D live wallpaper. You can control and interact with Neural Networks with your mouse.

name: Heroes of Fantasia
description: What dangers lurk in the unknown area? What kind of treasure is buried in the secret darkroom? What adventures will brave warriors encounter on their way to endless mystery? The secret place is waiting for you

name: DressMaker
description: This app lets you make a one-piece (texture) of a 3D avatar made with ‘’Cecil HenShin App” and ”VRoid Studio”. Import VRM and dress up!

name: Kitt.Io
description: Can you gain the biggest kitten following?

name: Hyperstar
description: A challenging and action-packed 2D survival shooter. Defend yourself from dangerous enemies by piloting ancient starships, each armed with unique and powerful weaponry.

name: Golden Retriever
description: Dig down into the ground and extract as much gold as you can! Prospect, mine, and maintain, all while keeping Dinos at bay. Rocky and Wells are two determined dogs that are new to mining but know how to work hard and have fun at the same time.

name: Merto's Part
description: Merto's Part is a First Person Exploration game. Well..Who is Merto? He is anyone. He is just inside of some situations and he don't know anything. He need to help for choosing true moves. In this story, you will be in Merto's place and trying to find safe-zone for him.

name: UniDuni
description: Inspired by the classics, UniDuni is a lighthearted puzzle platformer adventure which celebrates the bonds of friendship. Invite a friend to work together across hand-crafted levels or challenge yourself and prove your skills!

name: EvolveLab
description: Evolve Lab is an online multiplayer game in which you try to descend as deep as possible into the depths of an unknown planet. In each stage you will fight against creatures that were created by other players until you are the first player to reach a new record depth!

name: Crowded Blue Dot
description: Crowded Blue Dot is a game about producing various items to make people happy and growing a city from a small village to a metropolis.

name: Unite
description: Unite is a two-player board game based on Lines of Action (a game created in the 1960's). Players take turns moving, trying to connect their pieces. The single-player mode provides 7 difficulty levels. Or play online against an opponent over the network.

name: Sausage Dog Tends to Infinity
description: Sausage Dog Tends To Infinity is a classic Sokoban-like 3D puzzle game in which you must stretch yourself to infinity to solve puzzles and uncover ancient wisdom. Learn and grow as you explore a deserted world and discover the answers to questions you have yet to ask.

name: Xenomare
description: Everyone is dead. Your only chance is the escape shuttle... but you need fuel and oxygen. And find the codes for the self-destruct... just hope IT does not find you first.

name: Vulto
description: Experience a cyberpunk adventure full of strategy, espionage and stealth in the eyes of Engel, a survivor from the collapsed city of Hevland who starts on a journey to become a special agent called Vulto.

name: Hexonomy
description: Rule the field by creating organizations from the ground up and dominating the economic markets of Hexonomy. Chain together hundreds of businesses to build the most cost efficient economic empire in this chess-like business strategy simulation.

name: Sunrise Tragedy
description: Traverse an old, abandoned cathedral filled with grotesque monsters and bloodthirsty vampires. Overcome relentless enemies and heart-pounding boss fights with your choice of weapons, costumes, and spells in this macabre 2D Action-RPG.

name: Cycles of Aylorea
description:
Strengthen Your Soul, Craft Your Legacy, Rise as a Warden of Aylorea.

An MMORPG with base building, roguelike elements, always on PvP, and other survival elements.

name: Koma
description: Nonaddictive 30 minutes mind refreshing experience filled with 404zero's live sessions music

name: Dex Survival
description: Dex Survival is a single player Drone action game made by an Haitian indie game studio in Canada. The game is focus on quick combat and an enjoyable gameplay. You'll play as a little drone and be send to different mission to survive and defend.

name: Gowf
description: Gowf is an arcade style golf game with a classic 3-click hit system. Features an RPG style adventure mode where you can level-up and customize your character's skills and equipment to win tournaments across a variety of courses and online play with up to 8 friends.

name: Shots
description: Shots is a PvP action multiplayer shooter game with a lots of weapons!

name: Seven Demons
description: Dive into an amazing adventure! The girls and people of the Kingdoms need your help! Learn new techniques. Rebuild your village, build dwellings for the needy. Free the people from slavery! A lot of quests, dangerous battles with bloodthirsty creatures, beautiful girls are waiting for you.

name: Demon Tamer
description: Tame beasts and demons, use them to fight other demons, train them, and win back your country.

name: Demon Source
description: Demon Source is a soulslike roguelike game with procedural generated dungeons. Try new builds each run. Gather the Source to unlock new items and abilities. Solve the mystery of seven inhabitants of the Church. Try the Ultimate Challenge with great classical music. It is made by one person!

name: Far Cry 4: Overrun
description: Play as Rakshasa and Golden Path to swarm conflict zones, and overrun your opponents in maps based on Kyrat’s countryside. 4 new PvP maps, 1 new PvP mode and 1 new vehicle - the Buggy - included in PvP mode.

name: Orbis Sepia: The End of Worlds
description: Orbis Sepia: The End of Worlds is a roguelike strategy game playing in an infinite procedurally generated universe. As a giant creature the size of a planet, your only source of food is... planets! Explore the universe and eat planets to keep exploring, seek the purpose of your existance!

name: The Garden of Orilon
description: Meet your engagements with the ones who keep watch on you. Your memories are sealed and soul binds to soft dolls. When the doll opens its eyes, the castle where it appears is under attack...

name: Wilhelm Gustloff's Death
description: It is World War 2 and you are aboard the MV Wilhelm Gustloff which has just been struck with 3 torpedo strikes. You will relive the MV Wilhelm Gustloff's final moments in this atmospheric simulation.

name: Untangled: Payback
description: Untangled-Payback is an action-platformer about a deal that has gone wrong. Clyde, the main character of the game, is a gangster that got himself involved in a deal that costs him more than he thinks. Packed with his guns and skills, now he has to fight his way out to save himself and whomever he holds dear. He cannot stop until he reaches redemption and avenges the losses on his path.

name: PoliPlanet
description: Set on small procedurally generated planets, PoliPlanet is a unique first-person city building game. Discover new planets, gather resources, craft, explore, and build to create a thriving interplanetary civilization!

name: Scramble
description: Scramble is a resource management game in which you compete against other companies for the colonization of the New World.

name: Custam Sugoroku
description: A game of dice where you can create your own inside. Create your own map and save it to a file. Load the saved file and play with others.

name: Gongo
description: Gongo is a 2D side-scrolling platformer where the player goes through levels killing enemies and saving the princess. Each level has amazing hand-picked worlds. On each of the levels, a princess is hidden, which must be rescued and delivered to your castle, cleaning up enemies along the way.

name: Smart Tracks: Think and Run
description: A fun puzzle that combines the careful analysis of physics and logic with the adrenaline of rally racing. Overcome obstacles, survive deadly curves, make the best time, whether on asphalt, mud or snow, and become a legend on the tracks!

name: Track
description: This is a stealth based game where you will follow the mysterious man who kidnapped your boyfriend/husband/stepbrother, and to rescue them. It consists of three independent situational stories, each involving a heroine.

name: Zombies!
description: Zombies! A VR slasher/shooter adventure. Slay the zombies and discover clues about their origin.

name: We Sing Pop!: Solus Edition
description: Your Favourite Artists All in One Place

name: Unravel Yarney Bundle
description: Discover the delightful adventures of Unravel and Unravel Two, with the Unravel Yarny Bundle.

name: Panic at Community
description: A mini-games collection to play with your viewers on live streaming

name: Vigilance 2099
description: Vigilancer 2099 is a third-person Cyberpunk bounty-hunting game set in an isolated Megabuilding. Enter the skin, soul, and mind of your Vigilancer as you fight to stay alive long enough to pay off your bounty.

name: Sword of Symphony
description:
A music- action RPG cryptically connected to the story of ‘Purpose’

Created & solo-developed by Stephen Ddungu for his final year university project.

name: Magic Ring
description:
The legend speaks...。200 years ago, this Rainbow World was about to come to an end with the advent of the genie。The power of the genie was so great that I couldn't beat the sword as one of them。The genie obeyed seven servants and turned each kingdom into a strange world one after another。No more slippery, no more sadness, fear and despair, and the end of the world..。"Oh, God is not in this world..." Now, when the end of the world was about to come, a rainbow that was brighter than the sky fell。God entrusted the power of the rainbow to one man and gave birth to a hero。The hero sealed seven servants and, with the power of the rainbow, contained the genie toward him in the darkness。

This work is a real-time action game released in 1993。Players set out on an adventure in the world where the genie is about to revive, becoming the protagonist “sieve” who has been tailored to the hero in the “Hirder Academy”。

The game consists of top views, jumping, attacking, and using magic to fight and find the "rainbow fragments" scattered around the world..。There are a total of seven “rainbow fragments”, which not only give them special abilities such as dashes and aerial rest, but are also the key to the final stage。

8 stages in total。You'll leave the Brave Academy and aim for the castle of the Genie, but along the way you'll also enjoy the eyes with unique stages such as the country of sweets and haunted houses。

name: Deep Excavation
description: Discover what happened during Cryosleep in Deep Excavation. Explore the unique mines that the planet brings and what lies with them. Escape the planet, and survive the creatures you encounter.

name: Factory Defense
description: Factory Defence - is a first-person shooter in which you build automated factories and defend them. Plan your factory and defensive structures to take the enemy by surprise. Explore and colonize the planet alone or with friends.

name: Tiani
description: Virtual reality meets the world of old school role play where the powers good must fight and triumph over an evil power intent on the destruction of your lands magic and the death of your people.

name: Dream Card
description: Dream Card combines the technology of blockchain with collectible Trading Card Game. In the X World Games ecosystem, every NFT card is openly and transparently recorded on the chain and belongs to a specific player. Players can customize their cards to have new attributes and designs, which improves the game's playability.

name: Island Simulator 2016: Horror Pack
description: Horror Pack contains new scary story line and two new maps to explore. Are you ready for new adventure?

name: Signed and Sealed With a Kiss: Expansion Pack
description: Add more to your Signed and Sealed With a Kiss experience with the Fashionista and Thrillseeker Boyfriend types!

name: Super Kickers League: Goths and Vampires!
description: Super Kickers League : Goths & Vampires! brings dark and spooky new content to Super Kickers League! Get two new teams with their own captains and abilities, as well as one new map (playable by day or by night) and new music !

name: Super Kickers League: Vikings and Valkyries!
description: Super Kickers League : Vikings & Valkyries! brings nordics theme and elemental powers to Super Kickers League! Get two new teams with their own captains and abilities, as well as one new map (playable by day or by night) and new music !

name: Talisman: Complete Runestone Deck
description: A complete set of Runestone cards, which give your Talisman characters extra abilities, for use in online and offline game modes.Designed to speed up a game of Talisman, and also make your characters more powerful, Runestones are cards which you can attach to your characters to give them the advantage over their opponents.

name: Talisman: Legendary Deck
description: Make your adventures even more legendary than before, with new, extra challenging cards for Talisman: Digital Edition.

name: Blob.io
description: The Most EPIC Blobs vs Blobs Online Action battles out here!

name: Inheritors2078
description: Inheritors 2078 is an RTS/TPS/FPS hybrid game with full Multiplayer & Co-op support, taking its events in the near future where the world is being dominated by evil robotic incarnates that were once enslaved by humans.

name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Xtreme Legends - New Stage & Animal Pack
description: In Free Mode, 8 battlefields from previous Dynasty Warriors games are recreated for a total of 24 additional stages. In addition, unique animals such as Mammoth and Polar Bear can be obtained in the "Animal Battle" for each battlefield.

name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Xtreme Legends - New Stage & Camp Symbol
description: 30 stages will be added to Free Mode. Additionally, a total of 10 new camp symbols based on themes such as the "Five Generals" and "Two Qiaos" will be added to Ambition Mode.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Hikaru: Book II
description: In the finale of Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons, become Tsubasa one last time and begin an epic journey spanning time and space while uncovering some of largest secrets of the Mystic Destinies universe.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shou
description: Despite his problems, Shou does his best to help support Tsubasa as she learns about her new world and how to control her powers. But as they grow closer, the two soon learn of an ancient threat lurking amidst the darkness: one that will take all of their abilities to stop, else they'll forfeit their very lives.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shinji Epilogue
description: One year after the events of the Spring Castle, you and Shinji are still together. You two seem to both be growing and changing and yet...there are still so many questions unanswered. Finally, you turn to the only one who may be able to help answer them. But even if you know the answer, will you be able to grasp the truth?

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Deluxe Edition
description: Expand the Mystic Destinies experience with additional content!

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Hikaru: Book 1
description: In the finale of Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons, become Tsubasa one last time and begin an epic journey spanning time and space while uncovering some of largest secrets of the Mystic Destinies universe. In the process, you may just find yourself falling in love with a man who is anything but what you expected.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shou Epilogue
description: It's been five months since the incidents at Caro mansion. Your relationship with Shou is going well and you even bring him along to meet your family. But there are still some things you feel Shou is keeping from you about his new life.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Tatsuya Epilogue
description: Fast forward two years to the future and see how life has changed for you and Tatsuya. While you've never been more in love, you're not quite as far along in the relationship as you'd hoped. After a romantic date though, your life changes forever. Can an old threat bring promises of a new, brighter future?

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Tatsuya
description: Forced to take sides even as she tries to control on her unstable powers and emotions, Tsubasa is pulled into large scale business negotiations and the politics of the ancient Ryu clan. Can you navigate a path wrought with mysteries and drama to find happiness?

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Takumi
description: Rejecting the path set before her by Professor Kazama, Tsubasa turns to her childhood friend Takumi for help in finding her mother – an enigma directly tied to Takumi’s brother, Yasu. Despite being targeted by an all-powerful vampire mafia, the pair follows the faint trails of evidence, spending night after night in the underworld,...

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shinji
description: "It's fine, don't worry about it." These are common words said by Shinji, who is well-known around Hagiwara's campus for being a helpful guy. But when people misread his reliable nature for something more, he withdraws into himself.

name: Operation Desolate Void
description: Operation Desolate Void is a multiplayer FPS based around choosing the right weapons & equipment to head into a mission with to make it out alive.

name: Ride: Yamaha Historical Bikes
description: Download the Yamaha Historical Bikes DLC Pack to receive the bikes that have defined the last 20 years of Yamaha motorcycle production.

name: Paper Tales: Catch Up Games
description: Paper Tales is a dynamic card game suitable for mobile. Build a comprehensive strategy and adapt the shape of your realm according to opportunities and restrictions and you will make history!

name: Puzzle: Stone Blocks - Levels Pack 2 Persia
description: New 30 levels.

name: Puzzle: Stone Blocks - Levels Pack 1 Greece
description: New 30 levels.

name: Puzzle: Stone Blocks - Levels Pack 5 BigMix 1
description: New 30 levels.

name: Puzzle: Stone Blocks - Levels Pack 4 Mayan
description: New 30 levels.

name: Cloud Song: Saga of Skywalkers
description: Decide what life you want to have and embark on your journey - summon and collect pets, battle against enemies, customize to your heart’s content and explore the world in Cloud Song, a mobile MMORPG adventure SEA.

name: Far North
description:
Far North is a sandbox co-op procedural open world survival game with changing seasons.

Set in the deep North your survival depends solely on your ability to thrive.
Build and expand settlements in order to brave through the changing seasons ranging from beautiful summer days to fierce winter nights.e.

name: Endless World: Ice and Fire Mercenary Pack
description: This DLC includes two powerful mages with “ice and fire” elements respectively: snow queen EVA & fire elf FEU. They also bring you a great deal of rare resources

name: Endless Space 2: Untold Tales
description: Uncover hidden secrets, intriguing stories and endearing characters scattered across your Empire in Endless Space 2: Untold Tales with its 21 exclusive Quests, 4 new Minor Factions and 4 new Heroes. You will soon realize that while the Endless galaxy might be governed by a few powerful forces, it is still inhabited by masses of minority...

name: Endless Space 2: Dark Matter
description: From a series of quests investigating the strange events that preceded the fall of the Endless to simple problems of unruly subjects, enjoy the gamut of experiences and adventures from 12 new quests to discover, all set in the vast strangeness of the Endless Universe!

name: Deity
description: Play as a Deity on a meditative journey through various worlds. Embody a unique creature in each world and travel amidst ultra peaceful meditative music.

name: Time of Special Team
description: In 2035, Cauldron-City with only disorder and chaos remain. Assigned as a sniper of the confidential special team, you must remove the enemies covertly and accurately.

name: Siberian Dawn: Mission Pack 2
description: Mission Pack 2 gives you 3 new full Missions, completing the first chapter of the Siberian Dawn story. Requires Mission Pack 1 to play.

name: Siberian Dawn: Mission Pack 1
description: Mission Pack 1 gives you the full Core game of Siberian Dawn, adding 9 new Units to the Union Bloc and 9 new Units to the Guild Bloc, along with the Bond system. Mission Pack 1 also includes the first 3 Missions of the Siberian Dawn story. The full Siberian Dawn Core experience.

name: Monitor: The Game - The Good Left The City
description: "I certainly hope you believe in something... ...every Story has to have an end...” The Good Left The City: the short novel conclusion to Alix: A MONITOR Story.

name: Fort Defense: Atlantic Ocean
description: Battlestations! The pirates are preparing to board again! Surely you didn't think that the pirates would leave once and for all? Build towers, cast spells, collect barrels of rum and believe in victory!

name: Fort Defense: Bermuda Triangle
description: Take what you can, give nothing back! This time of the secrets of the Bermuda Triangle will submit to you.

name: Battle Academy: Fortress Metz
description: In Battle Academy: Fortress Metz you play the forces of the US 3rd Army as it tries to encircle Metz and cause the city to capitulate. Ten missions based on historical situations will test your skills as a commander.

name: Battle Academy: Blitzkrieg France
description: Following the invasion of Poland, Germany opens the western front and invades France. It’s the Blitzkrieg, a new and dangerous form of warfare based on speed and aggression using concentrated mechanized forces to pierce the enemy lines and encircle them.

name: Battle Academy 2: Battle of Kursk
description: Battle of the Kursk is the first expansions for action-packed tactical masterpiece Battle Academy 2. It focuses on the key events of the Soviet counteroffensive and can be played from both sides: capture the station at Ponyri, the “little Stalingrad”, defend the road to Oboyan and launch the armoured charge at Prokhorovka

name: Battle Academy: Operation Sealion
description: It is September 1940, and the Germans launch their invasion of Britain. In this fictional "What If?" Campaign , you command the Home Guard's desperate counterattacks against German glider troops and the tenacious defence of the South Coast Sea Front.

name: Battle Academy: Operation Husky
description: Can you do better than General Patton and Montgomery? Open the attack on the soft underbelly of Europe in "Operation Husky", with nine missions detailing the invasion of Sicily. With more than 30 new units, and missions ranging from the chaos of the initial night drops to the grim battles across the baking hills of the...

name: Battle Academy: Rommel in Normandy
description: This time, play the Normandy campaign from the other side and play as the Germans and their mighty Tigers through ten varied missions. Take command from the initial chaos of the airborne drops all the way through to the desperate escape from the Falaise pocket and learn the skills required to control an army stretched to its limit by...

name: WGT Golf: Birdie Bundle
description: Improving your short game is key to lowering your scores, and this heavily discounted bundle will get you on track toward more birdies.

name: Prison Ball: Full Blown - Damon Blood
description: Damon Blood only cares about clearing the bricks so that he can make his way to his opponent on the other side hiding behind that paddle. But he knows that if he can avoid the blow attacks and get close enough that his enemies blood will spurt into the air with a quick strike!

name: X-Plane 11: FSDG - Bremen XP
description: FSDG's most detailed scenery Bremen is now available for XPlane 11!

name: X-Plane 11: FSDG - Dakar
description: Welcome to one of the most modern airports in Africa with this stunning scenery of Blaise Diagne International Airport!

name: X-Plane 11: Global Scenery - North America
description: X-Plane 11 Global Scenery: North America is a free DLC that you can activate thru your Steam Client. It will give you the default North America Scenery.

name: X-Plane 11: FSDG - Kapstadt XP
description: Cape Town International Airport is now available for XPlane 11!

name: X-Plane 11: FSDG - Graz
description: The international airport of Austria's second largest city Graz finally gets the Flight Simulator scenery it deserves! With more than 1 million passengers and a dozen major airlines visiting Graz-Thalerhof every year you are now able to join them.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - XPRealistic v.2
description: XPRealistic V2 brings a whole new world of immersion into X-Plane. With a growing list of 40 realistic camera and sound effects, you will experience X-Plane like never before.

name: X-Plane 11: Global Scenery - Asia
description: X-Plane 11 Global Scenery: Asia is a free DLC that you can activate thru your Steam Client. It will give you the default Asia Scenery.

name: X-Plane 11: Global Scenery - South America
description: X-Plane 11 Global Scenery: South America is a free DLC that you can activate thru your Steam Client. It will give you the default South America Scenery.

name: X-Plane 11: 29 Palms/Captain7 - EDDN: Nuernberg XP
description: This add-on brings Bavaria's second largest international airport in an incomparably authentic and lively atmosphere to XPlane.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - St. Tropez
description: Based on the latest image sources, highly detailed objects were created at and along the airport. In addition, the villages La Mole and Le Moulin Roux were upgraded with individual autogen.

name: X-Plane 11: FACO Simulations - F-15C Eagle
description: If you think you only fly Airliners and GA: The archaic navigation system of the F-15C will give any pilot a challenge offering a fun way to practice those difficult instrument skills at a much faster pace!

name: X-Plane 11: Globall Art - CYYZ: Toronto Pearson International
description: Toronto Pearson International Airport (IATA: YYZ, ICAO: CYYZ), officially named Lester B. Pearson International Airport, is an international airport serving the city of Toronto, Ontario, Canada, the Greater Toronto Area, and the Golden Horseshoe, an urban agglomeration of 9.2 million people.

name: X-Plane 11: Global Scenery - Europe
description: X-Plane 11 Global Scenery: Europe is a free DLC that you can activate thru your Steam Client. It will give you the default Europe Scenery.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft Svalbard4XPlane
description: Svalbard is a highly realistic recreation of the Svalbard islands for XPlane 11. The Norwegian archipelago in the Arctic Ocean is situated about midway between continental Norway and the North Pole. The islands range from 74° to 81° northern latitude, north of the Polar Circle. This area isn‘t covered by the XPlane default scenery.

name: X-Plane 11: Add-on - Aerosoft Dortmund XP
description: Discover the centre of the Ruhr region in XPlane 11, the scenery Dortmund XP is a complete recreation of the city of Dortmund in the flight simulator.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - Paderborn XP
description: Explore the home airport of Aerosoft in XPlane 11 with Paderborn XP!

name: X-Plane 11: Add-on - Aerosoft Aspen XP
description: This add-on contains the airport of Aspen with an extended runway, new taxiways, a fire station, a terminal, and hangars, all with high-resolution textures. You can furthermore explore dozens of custom local landmarks, like Aspen High School, Aspen Chapel, and the Aspen Recreation Center.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - German Islands 1: East Frisia
description: Discover the East Frisian North Sea islands with the new XPlane 11 add-on German Islands 1: East Frisia.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - Ibiza XP
description: Bring home some holiday feeling and enjoy the detailed airport as well as the fantastic sceneries of the two islands Ibiza and Formentera.

name: X-Plane 11: Add-on - Aerosoft Helgoland XP
description: Helgoland XP is a scenery for XPlane 11 that recreates Germany's only island in the open sea at a high level of detail and with many thrilling new options.

name: X-Plane 11: Skyline Simulations - KCVG: Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International XP
description: Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport offers non-stop passenger service to 62 destinations with 179 peak daily departures. The airport's international destinations include Cancún, Cozumel, Freeport, Montego Bay, Paris, Punta Cana, Reykjavík, and Toronto.

name: X-Plane 11: Skyline Simulations - KSNA: John Wayne International
description: John Wayne International Airport (IATA: SNA, ICAO: KSNA, FAA LID: SNA) is located in Orange County near Los Angeles, USA. KSNA provides General aviation operations, commercial operations and several facilities.

name: X-Plane 11: Global Scenery - Africa
description: X-Plane 11 Global Scenery: Africa is a free DLC that you can activate thru your Steam Client. It will give you the default Africa Scenery.

name: X-Plane 11: FSDG - Mauritius
description: Paradise at its best - the unique Ile de Maurice, one of the most beautiful and scenic islands in the world, now available for XPlane!

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - CRJ 200
description: The Canadair Regional Jet CRJ-200 is a short-range, single-aisle commuter jet and with 1021 built units the most popular regional jet today. The JRollon CRJ-200 brings this famous airliner to the simulator known for its accurate flight dynamics.

name: X-Plane 11: Add-on - JustAsia: Real World Malaysia
description: Realworld Malaysia covers a whopping 330,803 km² and covers west and east Malaysia. JustAsia harness the lastest autogen technology especially for XPlane which allows for region specific houses, shops, highrise and buildings to be placed using XPlane built in OSM data to ensure maximum immersion.

name: X-Plane 11: FSDG - Sharm El-Sheikh XP
description: The popular Sharm El-Sheikh International Airport scenery from FSDG is now available for XPlane 11!

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - Faroe Islands XP
description: The scenery Faroe Islands XP now recreates the entire archipelago for XPlane 11.

name: X-Plane 11: Skyline Simulations - MKJS: Montego Bay Jamaica
description: In partnership with LatinVFR, Skyline Simulations brings you the very first detailed Jamaican airport for X-Plane 11.

name: X-Plane 11: Add-on - SAM FollowMe
description: Don't get lost on any airport by using SAM FollowMe service to guide you to your parking position.

name: X-Plane 11: Add-on - Aerosoft Reggio Calabria XP
description: Fly to the tip of Italy's distinctive boot shape with Reggio Calabria XP. This highly detailed scenery brings you to Reggio Calabria, named after Italian Royal Air Force war-hero Tito Minniti, who was born in Reggio Calabria.

name: Void Destroyer 2: Ashes
description: The Ashes DLC expands the Void Destroyer 2 ship line up with additional ships and a base from an unknown faction.

name: Void Destroyer 2: Big Red
description: The Big Red DLC expands the Void Destroyer 2 ship line up with additional ships from the Digger faction.

name: Zooma: Chapter 2 - "Cave"
description: Enter the cave and have no fear: cannibal outcasts may be living here, but they won’t harm you. A former mine is now abandoned, although still rich in resources. The reason for that was the whispers workers would start hearing after spending a few days underground. Don’t waste a moment, hurry up, and finish all your business in this god-forsaken place without delay!

name: Zooma:Chapter 3 - "Shadow Valley"
description: Shadow Valley. Gentle wind rustles the tree leaves in the twilight valley. Take a walk along the river, draw a deep breath of fresh air: it will give you strength and make your aim true, so you are better prepared for the upcoming challenge.

name: Zooma:Chapter 4 - "Temple of the Damned"
description: Nobody is welcome at the Temple, and only the moans of ghosts and the breath of the volcano that slowly devours the once-mighty fortress break the silence. Do you have what it takes to defeat the prehistoric evil and revive this dark stronghold to its previous glory?

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: 2020 GT World Challenge Pack
description: The 2020 GT WORLD CHALLENGE PACK DLC adds a new track, two new cars, more than 60 new liveries and all teams of the 2020 GT World Challenge season in ACC, alongside with the new Pirelli 2020 "DHE" Tyre Model, new season BoP, improved AI algorithms and optimized overall performance.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: British GT Pack
description: The BRITISH GT PACK DLC brings all the action of the 2019 British GT Championship by SRO Motorsports Group to Assetto Corsa Competizione and it includes 3 new circuits: Donington Park, Oulton Park and Snetterton. Furthermore , mixed class racing is included into the new version of ACC.

name: The Alpha 001
description: Dive into the simulation, explore, play mini games, break loot boxes, grow plantations on your farm, fight orcs, play with your friends, rescue robots, increase your village's population, mine resources, conquer villages! The simulation will prepare a lot of different things for you, get ready.

name: Battlerite Royale: All Champions Pack
description: The Royale All Champions Pack unlocks all of the current and future Champions featured in Battlerite Royale.

name: Invisible: Story Extension
description: Get Deeper into the Story from Invisible with the Story Extension DLC.

name: MotoGP 21: Limited Edition Liveries
description: Purchase Limited Edition Liveries and compete with five iconic riders and their exclusive bikes. Unique liveries created for special events during their careers.

name: MotoGP 19: Historical Pack
description: Purchase the Historical Pack and relive the thrilling challenges of the 1992 season!

name: MotoGP 20: Historic Pack
description: Buy the Historic Pack and compete with four of the most iconic riders of MotoGP history and their bikes!

name: Valentino Rossi: The Game - Real Events: 2015 MotoGP Season
description: This additional content will allow you to relive the most exciting events of the 2015 MotoGP season.

name: MotoGP 15: GP de Portugal Circuito Estoril
description: Inaugurated in 1972, the Estoril circuit hosted the MotoGP from 2000 to 2012, the same year Jorge Lorenzo set the circuit record.

name: MotoGP 14: Donington Park British Grand Prix DLC
description: The MotoGP14 Donington Park British Grand Prix pack adds this sensational circuit to the game.

name: MotoGP 14: Red Bull Rookies Cup DLC
description: The Red Bull Rookies Cup will add the game this exciting competition.

name: MotoGP 13:Red Bull Rookies Cup
description: The Red Bull Rookies Cup will add this exciting competition to the game.Since its inception in 2007 it has grown into one of the most thrilling 2 wheel spectacles in the world. Teenagers from around the world know that the best way of getting a start in Grand Prix motorcycle racing is by entering the Red Bull MotoGP Rookies Cup.

name: MotoGP 13: MotoGP Champions
description: MotoGP Champions gives you the opportunity to race as, and against, legendary riders of the past, including Doohan, Schwantz, Rainey, Spencer, Gardner, Capirossi and many others. Ride their historical 2 stroke 500 CC bikes and experience all the excitement of being a Motogp legend.

name: WWE 2K17: New Moves Pack
description: New Moves Pack:Over 50 new moves to add to your arsenal! Stun your opponents with the Swingout Neckbreaker like Charlotte, dive off the top rope with a Zack Ryder Elbro Drop, or give your opponent a Face Wash Combo like Samoa Joe.

name: WWE 2K17: Accelerator
description: AcceleratorDecide the overall rankings and attribute levels of every WWE Superstar and Legend in the game. Unlock every WWE Superstar and Legend, including alternate attires with the Accelerator pack!

name: WWE 2K17: Hall of Fame Showcase
description: Hall of Fame Showcase:Relive some of WWE’s most historic matches featuring the 2016 Hall of Fame Class and also get new playable characters, attires, and arenas! Matches include Sting vs Ric Flair (1988), Cactus Jack and Diamond Dallas Page vs. The Fabulous Freebirds (1992), Papa Shango vs. The Godfather, Big Boss Man vs.

name: WWE 2K17: NXT Enhancement Pack
description: NXT Enhancement Pack: Playable characters Apollo Crews, Nia Jax and Shinsuke Nakamura Earn a 50% boost in points earned for your MyCareer Superstar while in NXT!

name: Logistical 2: Vampires - Bundle
description: This Logistical 2: Vampires has over 1000 towns and 16,000 businesses to complete PLUS there are Vampires. Vampires are slowly taking over the country. Provide resources for the towns people to help push back the vampires to where they belong within Romania.

name: The Lion's Song: Episode 3 - Derivation
description: In "Episode 3 – Derivation", you take on the role of Emma, a brilliant mathematician, who struggles to make her voice heard in the male-dominated world of academics at the beginning of the 20th century. Can she lift the curtain of reality to get a glimpse of the principles governing her world?

name: The Lion's Song: Episode 4 - Closure
description: "Episode 4 – Closure", will take players on a mysterious train journey that brings together four strangers and connects the storylines of all three previously released episodes. What stories will they share along the way and where will their journey end?

name: Hybrid Wars: Yana 'Tesla' Radovich
description: Get your hands on this exclusive hero, a famous technoblogger and promoter of all things futuristic: Yana “Tesla” Radovich. Jump into a future where those with the quickest wits and biggest guns survive.

name: Hybrid Wars: Yoko Takano
description: Up your game with a whole new character, a high-level specialist in tech-espionage and corporate security: Yoko Takano. Take on wave after wave of enemy forces using her unique skills and arsenal.

name: WWE 2K17: Future Stars Pack
description: Future Stars Pack:Play as 5 of WWE’s brightest new Superstars. The Future Stars pack features Austin Aries, Karl Anderson, Luke Gallows, Mojo Rawley, and Tye Dillinger.

name: Crusader Kings II: Finno-Ugric Unit Pack
description: Crusader Kings II: Finno-Ugric Unit PackEnhance your Crusader Kings II experience with the Finno-Ugric Unit Pack. The Finno-Ugric Unit Pack adds seven new, unique unit models for Finnish, Lappish, Komi, Samoyed and Mordvin rulers.

name: Wonky Ship: Black Hole Down
description: Rock the Cat Ship with some purr-fect extras!

name: Max, an Autistic Journey: Max's Birthday
description: Spend a day with Max as he excitedly wakes up eager to celebrate his birthday!

name: Faction Wars
description: A grid based single / local multiplayer strategy game where two factions clash in deadly turn based battles.

name: GunBlocks
description: Stranded on a mysterious planet you need to find your ships lost cargo and collect resources to repair your ship and get off planet. Use tetrominos to make your way through the strange new world, solve puzzles and get to know its not too friendly inhabitants.

name: Vega Conflict: Punisher Cruiser Pack
description: The most essential piece of any Xeno Division fleet is the brutal, all-purpose Punisher Cruiser. Now is the time to get yours! Pick up this pack to receive 3 Punisher Cruisers, as well as a full complement of Xeno Disintegrator Cannons to rain down destruction upon the Alien menace.

name: Vega Conflict: Cavalier Cutter Pack
description: The swiftest Altairian hull, the Cavalier Cutters are the ultimate defence against stasis, their Catalyst Overdrive converting stasis energy into shield defense and speed.

name: Vega Conflict: Exterminator Pack
description: Exterminator Destroyers are a highly sought-after hull for base sniping and PvE Outpost combat. Their tremendous range is boosted even further by the Xeno Shatter Driver. Any base you want to destroy? Destroy it.

name: Vega Conflict: Dread Battleship Pack
description: Ready to rule the galaxy with an iron fist? Check out the Dread Pack: a one of a kind array of weaponry, resistance tech, and high value gold. The Dread Battleship will allow you to take the fight to your enemies.

name: Vega Conflict: Bastion Cruiser Pack
description: The formidable Bastion Cruiser hulls boast built-in Counter-Chain and the Firestorm Overdrive which unleashes devastating damage when your shields drop.

name: Vega Conflict: Paragon Battleship Pack
description: The true firepower of the Altairian faction, Paragon Battleships trigger their explosive Barrage Overdrive when surrounded, ensuring they never go down without a fight.

name: Vega Conflict: Paladin Pack
description: As the flagship of the AXIS Project, the Paladin Carrier is a perfect combination of offensive firepower and dynamic support, featuring an interchangeable Support Field and Harmonic Fleet wide bonuses.

name: Dan Sisal's 501 Darts Trainer
description: Welcome to Dan Sisal's 501 Darts Trainer! The darts game for when you can't make it to the pub.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Russian Empire
description: The second campaign - Battle of Empires: Russian Empire - is devoted to the battles between the Russian and German armies on the Eastern front. Both of these campaigns are included in the base game.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - British Empire
description: British campaign covers the Anzac battle path from 1915 to 1918. Battles under the scorching sun in Gallipoli, in flooded trenches of Flanders and in the ruins of the towns of Picardy await you. The first tank attacks, sabotage operations, large-scale infantry battles and hill assaults.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Battle of Cambrai
description: Historical multiplayer reconstruction, dedicated to the offensive of the Entente forces at Cambrai in 1918.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - German Campaign
description: In the new campaign, you'll be able to see the war from the perspective of an ordinary officer. You will have to fight alongside Turkish and Austrian troops against the Serbian and Italian armies.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - French Campaign
description: The first campaign of the series - Battle of Empires: France - is devoted to the battles between the French and German armies on the Western Front.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Real War
description: Feel the most realistic atmosphere of the Great War for free!

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - MP Pack 1
description: Set of 10 additional multiplayer maps.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Honor of the Empire
description: In the Austria-Hungary campaign You will go through the horrors of the siege of Przemyśl, bloody battles on Isonzo's banks, the chilling cold of Tyrol and the heat of the Romanian plains.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Skirmish Pack
description: This DLC is a Skirmish pack with two new game modes: "Trench Assault " and "Team Defence "

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - MP Pack 2
description: This addition to multiplayer functionality, includes three new competitive modes and six maps, for those modes.

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Takumi Epilogue
description: Several months after you solved a years-long case, you and Takumi are still working as partners on dangerous missions. With Valentine's Day coming up, you both resolve to try and relax for once and go on a proper date.

name: My Hero One's Justice: Additional Mission - Gale
description: Unlocks the additional mission "Gale." Complete it to acquire new items and accessories.

name: S.U.M. Slay Uncool Monsters: Rogue
description: In S.U.M. you'll put your Quick-Math skills to test! The Rogue can deal a lot of damage!

name: S.U.M. Slay Uncool Monsters: Paladin
description: In S.U.M. you'll put your Quick-Math skills to test! The Paladin in a strong and durable fighter.

name: S.U.M. Slay Uncool Monsters: Wizard
description: In S.U.M. you'll put your Quick-Math skills to test! The Wizard can deals a lot of damage with its Fireball Bonus Attack.

name: S.U.M. Slay Uncool Monsters: Assassin
description: In S.U.M. you'll put your Quick-Math skills to test! The Assassin hits the enemies where it hurts the most.

name: S.U.M. Slay Uncool Monsters: Archer
description: In S.U.M. you'll put your Quick-Math skills to test! The Archer is a versitile hero that will shoot Bonus Attacks faster than anyone!

name: Bubble Tea: Game for Thinking and Imagination - Escape
description: Let's help Blind man escape from the prison!

name: Planet Coaster: The Munsters Munster Koach Construction Kit
description: The Munsters Munster Koach Construction Kit features in-game replicas of the Munster Koach and the DRAG-U-LA drag racer from The Munsters episode ‘Hot Rod Herman’ and the classic 1966 movie Munster, Go Home!

name: Planet Coaster: Quick Draw Interactive Shooting Ride
description: Sharpen your aim in this target shooting ride. Ride the track, shoot the targets and log your high score in this test of accuracy. Or create your own themed interactive shooting galleries for a different experience every time.

name: Planet Coaster: Back to the Future Time Machine Construction Kit
description: The Back to the Future Construction Kit features in-game replicas of the DeLorean Time Machine in its original 1985 form, and in its 2015, 1955 and 1885 variants, with optional standard tires, ‘hover’ wheels, white-rimmed classic tires, or railway wheels.

name: Planet Coaster: Knight Rider K.I.T.T. Construction Kit
description: The Knight Rider K.I.T.T. Construction Kit features in-game replicas of K.I.T.T., K.I.T.T. in Super Pursuit mode, and the evil Knight Industries prototype K.A.R.R. with silver and black finish.

name: Electrified
description:
Electrified is a simple 2D platformer.
Use jump and dash to run around the world of Eleton!

Nova's mission is to recover all the Prisum Cubes.
The playground is a lot of fun, but beware of the needles and saws.

name: Earth Defense Force 5: Ranger Weapon Decoy Launcher (Pale Wing)
description: A balloon fashioned after a human, allowing it to act as a lure that draws enemy attention.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Hostess ILI from Dream Club, Giving the EDF a Try!?
description: This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon. This hostess was chosen to join the fight from "Dream Club," a club for adults that can only be joined by those with a pure heart.

name: Earth Defense Force: Iron Rain - Mission: Golden Storm
description: A special series of missions revolving around the EDF skirmish brigade, Blast, as they battle unknown foes.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Additional Character: Riho Futaba, Classic Hostess Costume
description: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is now joining the EDF as a playable character.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Hostess Mian from Dream Club, Giving the EDF a Try!?
description: This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon. This hostess was chosen to join the fight from "Dream Club," a club for adults that can only be joined by those with a pure heart.

name: Earth Defense Force 5: Air Raider Weapon Singing and Dancing Pure Decoy Launcher Set of 8
description: A set of 8 types of special Decoy Launchers for Air Raiders. The device launches a balloon that blows up into a human shape, acting as a decoy to draw the enemy's attention.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Prowl Rider (EDF: IR), KR Prototype & Special Gear
description: In the world of "Earth Defense Force: Iron Rain," the Kindred Rebellion ceded from the EDF and developed their own experimental Prowl Rider PA-Gear.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Hostess Setsu from Dream Club, Giving the EDF a Try!?
description: This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon. This hostess was chosen to join the fight from "Dream Club," a club for adults that can only be joined by those with a pure heart.

name: Earth Defense Force 4.1: Wing Diver the Shooter - Training Mode
description: Enjoy 60 short missions in the new training mode!

name: Monster Seek
description: Sci-fi 2D-adventure game. Help the genius scientist go back in time and make his main dream come true. On the way monsters, riddles and unexpected allies will be waiting for you.

name: Butcher Valley
description:
Meet Nora the human and Louie the fox, two adventurers looking for a good time. They are on their way to the port of Oak Angel, but trouble always find it's way, they stumble upon car problems on their way there.

Nora and Louie are now stranded in the middle of the forest, luckily they're now near the village of Butcher Valley, home to pine trees and plenty of strange folks. Do whatever it takes to get them to safety, but be careful, Butcher Valley doesn't take kindly to strangers.

name: Hardcore Mecha: Pilot Pack 1
description: Additional set of pilots from Hardcore Defense Corps. - Tarethur O'Connell, Edgar Feuerbach, Aylatanya Kiruna.

name: Project Aura: Junior Colonist
description: Claim your own Junior colonist and gain the ability to name him, choose profile and write his bio. After each major patch, the official database will be updated and any other player may find and recruit the colonist you created.

name: Project Aura: Senior Colonist
description: Claim your own Senior colonist and gain the ability to name him, choose profile and write his bio. After each major patch, the official database will be updated and any other player may find and recruit the colonist you created.

name: Project Aura: Super Engineer Colonist
description: Claim your own Super Engineer colonist and gain the ability to name him, choose profile and write his bio. After each major patch, the official database will be updated and any other player may find and recruit the colonist you created.

name: Project Aura: Master Colonist
description: Claim your own Master colonist and gain the ability to name him, choose profile and write his bio. After each major patch, the official database will be updated and any other player may find and recruit the colonist you created.

name: Tale of Wuxia: The Pre-Sequel - The Way to Nether
description: In the story of "The Way to Nether", the player can witness the history of how the Martial Artist Yan Dansheng built the "notorious" Fengdu with a group of dissimilar companions.

name: Tower!2011:SE - Key West KEYW Airport
description: Key West International Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!2011:SE

name: Tower!2011:SE - Honolulu PHNL Airport
description: Daniel K. Inouye International Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!2011:SE

name: Tower!2011:SE - Washington KIAD Airport
description: Washington Dulles International Airport is and airport DLC for Tower!2011:SE

name: Tower!2011:SE - Phoenix KPHX Airport
description: Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport is and airport DLC for Tower!2011:SE

name: Tower!2011:SE - Toronto CYYZ Airport
description: Toronto Pearson International Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!2011:SE

name: Tower!2011:SE - Chicago KORD Airport
description: Chicago O'Hare International Airport is and airport DLC for Tower!2011:SE

name: Tower!2011:SE - New Orleans KMSY Airport
description: Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!2011:SE

name: Tower!2011:SE - La Guardia KLGA Airport
description: New York La Guardia Airport is and airport DLC for Tower!2011:SE

name: Tower!2011:SE - Frankfurt EDDF Airport
description: Frankfurt International Airport is and airport DLC for Tower!2011:SE

name: Tower!2011:SE - Seattle KSEA Airport
description: Seattle-Tacoma International Airport is and airport DLC for Tower!2011:SE

name: Tower!2011:SE - Memphis KMEM Airport
description: Memphis International Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!2011:SE

name: Heretic Operative: Blood Cult
description: Heretic Operative: Blood Cult adds a challenging new Cult to the game. Survive 20 new Enemy cards and find a way to save your allies before they are converted into Cultist doppelgängers. Can you survive the horrors of the Blood Cult?

name: The Pit: Infinity - Healer
description: With a planet ravaged by disease and the only cure at the bottom of a long-abandoned alien science facility, SolForce medic Astryd Jemison must lay down her oath to do no harm, pick up her Transfuser pistol, and enter... The Pit.

name: The Pit: Infinity - Juggernaut
description: Summoned to Arbuda by the promise of a huge reward, Tor Makari is here to rescue a kidnapped human from a high-security alien facility and pull down the biggest bounty of his career. He is a force to be reckoned with, nigh unstoppable. He is a Juggernaut!

name: The Outbreak Guardian
description: The Outbreak Guardian is a third person open-world game where you are in charge of ensuring the welfare of the citizens of Patriam by managing the cities resources and agents, which involves delivering equipment and some driving.

name: Conqueror's Blade: Hounds of War
description: This top-class set of armor can be worn by all types of units: melee and ranged infantry, and cavalry. Let the enemy see that they're facing a tough opponent!

name: Vanguard Princess: Online Deluxe
description: Vanguard Princess: Online Deluxe features online netplay support for the Steam version of Vanguard Princess. The DLC is also an updated version of the game that also features unlocked characters, additional battle stages, in-game music, and story-lines.

name: Blaster Master Zero 2: Kanna Raising Simulator
description: Adds the ultra weird mini-game "Kanna Raising Simulator" to the EXTRA menu. Capture a variety of materials to make fertilizer and grow your very own Kanna! There are loads of potential Kannas to grow, and you can check out every one you've completed in "Kanna's Strangallery"!

name: Dungeonmans: Pay2Lose
description: Crush more monsters, get less loot, and discover all new ways to end up as bloody Triger Chow! Die of starvation, suffer crippling wounds, and watch your gear crumble into broken shards. Over 100 fine tuned difficulty options to challenge yourself, with new Leaderboards so you dunk on your chump friends.

name: Save the Pirate: Sea Story - Tribal Legacy
description: An adventure game about a funny pirate and a treasure hunt with logic tasks. The player has two options for the course of events, from which you need to choose the right one, guided by logic.

name: Cubox: Awakening of Gods
description: 3D blocky MMORPG open-world game. Build castles with friends, discover new biomes, new monsters and resources. Craft Items and upgrade equipment. Find new cities

name: RaceRoom Racing Experience: ADAC GT Masters Experience 2014
description: ADAC GT Masters Experience brings you all 8 tracks and 19 team cars from the 2014 Championship season, including the Audi R8 LMS Ultra, BMW Z4 GT3, Chevrolet Camaro GT3, Corvette Z06.R GT3, McLaren MP4-12C GT3, and Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG GT3. A two race format means you'll need to drive twice as hard on your way to the 2014 Championship title.

name: RaceRoom Racing Experience: DTM Experience 2014
description: Enter the world of a professional race car driver and experience the 2014 Championship season in the most authentic simulation to date. DTM Experience 2014 brings all 23 cars and 9 tracks from the 2014 race season to your PC. Ten races stand between you and becoming a DTM champion, enjoy the drive!

name: Trove: Square Necessities Pack
description: Get squared with the Square Necessities pack! These simple square necessities will take away your worriment with flight.

name: Trove: Dynomighty Miner Pack
description: Have a blast with this collection of underground gear and subterranean styles!

name: Trove: Arcanium Expedition Pack
description: Things are getting steamy in Trove! Run, sail, or soar into the world of Trove in steampunk style. Enter this portal to the pixelated realms of the Sun Goddess with a heartbroken companion cube at your side, or share the mysterious contents of an orange box with a friend. Are you still hovering here? Join the action!

name: Trove: Double Dragon Pack
description: Strike fear into the hearts of your foes with two incredible dragons: Yorinn, the Dusk Shadow, and Erel, the Ironbolt. Raise these fearsome flying mounts from their eggs, and you'll rain fire and lightning down as you glide across the sky.

name: Trove: Eclipse Pack
description: Grab your friends and set off for adventure in Trove, the ultimate action MMO! Revel in the wonders of the Sun, Moon, and Shadow all at once with this brand new pack. Brimming with new content, this pack features a whole mountain of mounts (including a pair of lethal skysharks), an alliance of allies, and a whole heap of super styles.

name: Trove: Botanical Blaster Pack
description: Plants versus everything! Grow and blow (up)!

name: Trove: Geode Companion Pack 2
description: What could be better than scoring a rad(ish) new companion? Get an uncommon Wistful Froleek companion, a heaping helping of Bronze Companion Eggs & more. Includes Wistful Froleek companion, 25x Crystal Pinatas, 10x Accelerite, 5x Bronze Companion Eggs, 2x Lodestars

name: Trove: Geode Companion Pack 1
description: Who doesn't want a creepy companion that'll leave you howling for more? Get a Glamorous Howlug Companion, a heaping helping of Bronze Companion Eggs & more.

name: Subliminal Region
description: The first game of Sorcerer’s Records Series Season 3 is here! Check out the story of Sorcerer's Records, which is more mature than ever! This game is a standard lower window novel game for men of all ages.

name: Mint Muse Sound Flare
description: Sound Flare is a new digital audio workstation (DAW) built from the ground up for mixing 3D spatial audio in VR. Its intuitive design enables fast audio production in VR and efficient production schedules for both 3D audio and 3D video projects.

name: Dungeon & Heros
description: Dungeon Heros is an idle and roguelite game that I personally developed, recruit and develop your team of heroes, in the randomly generated map to explore,collect equipment and soul skills,in the infinite reincarnation to build the strongest team.

name: Maenovan
description: You are America's only hope! Work to bring the Federation to its knees in this interstellar space adventure game featuring space combat, mining, and a lore rich story!

name: Freedom! Do or Die
description: When terrorism threatens the world there is no need to send a bunch of iconic movie heroes back from the '80s. One under-funded over-powered mercenary is all that's needed to save the world in this epic run 'n' gun destruction-fest of a homage to Broforce!

name: Legacy of Datura
description: Embark on a magical adventure between a cyberpunk and a medieval world. A 2D fantasy inspired by Hong Kong recent historical events.

name: Just A Memory!
description: Just a Memory is a story based choice and consequence game featuring Aaron Page, a 19 year-old college student investigating the murder of his best friend while confronting his demons.

name: Tank Rampage
description: Tank Rampage is an online team action game where you control a tank in small arenas in fast battles against players from all over the world!

name: Infinite sky
description: This is an escape flight game. The pace of the game is very tight. The player's goal is to survive as much as possible.

name: Mind VR Exploration
description: This is an unprecedented exploratory learning VR application. The most cutting-edge VR digital technologies are adopted to bring an immersive experience with various elements, such as, Chinese classical architectures, implements, poems, and extraordinary imagination, to users, very impressive.

name: Power & Revolution 2020 Edition: 2019 Scenarios
description: Play as the Head of State or as the opposition on 01/01/2019: play as several countries to combat global warming and other serious threats to the planet, insert yourself into the global disorder of the "Chaos 2030" scenario or improve conditions for women in conservative countries.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 8: The One-eyed Dragon
description: An additional playable scenario, "The One-eyed Dragon". This scenario centers around the bold and ambitious One-Eyed Dragon, Masamune Date, and his heroic gamble to seize control of the land. This is a story of passion and unbridled ambition.

name: Power & Revolution 2020 Edition: 2016 Scenarios
description: Play as a head of state or as the opposition on 01/01/2016: participate in the numerous conflicts raging around the world (Syria, Iraq, Libya, Nigeria, Somalia) reconstructed to the smallest detail, try to win the US presidential election or quickly get married in France.

name: Power & Revolution: 2019 Edition - 2017 Scenarios
description: With the 2017 Scenarios add-on, play as the new President of the United States and try to implement your bold and controversial policies; participate in the French elections with the official candidates; increase the happiness of your people; and take advantage of all the data updated for 2017, including historical conflict maps.

name: Berserk and the Band of the Hawk: Additional Scenario Set
description: This is a special pack of additional scenarios. Following scenarios are included in this package: Additional Scenario 1 The Battle of the Eclipse -VS the Band of the Hawk Reborn- Additional Scenario 2 The Infiltration of Doldrey Additional Scenario 3 Wind Cutting Through the Storm Additional Scenario 4 The Evil Feast of the Strong...

name: Power & Revolution: 2019 Edition - 2018 Scenarios
description: With the 2018 Scenarios add-on, set out to conquer Mars and other unexplored planets; as the head of the American opposition party, prevent the start of nuclear war between the USA and North Korea; foil planned attacks on your territory; and take advantage of all the data updated for 2018, including historical conflict maps.

name: Power & Revolution 2020 Edition: 2018 Scenarios
description: Play as the Head of State or as the opposition on 01/01/2018: set out to conquer Mars or other unexplored planets, prevent the start of nuclear war between the US and North Korea or thwart a terrorist attack being planned on your territory.

name: Monolith
description: A sci-fi Virtual Reality game focused on high-intensity combat. Experience mythical weapons such as Thor's hammer Mjolnir, Zeus's shield Aegis, and more as you defend against enemies in this action-packed exciting game!

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 1: Stronger Than a Alliance
description: An additional playable scenario, "Stronger Than a Alliance". Having spent a part of their troubled youths together, Ieyasu Tokugawa and Nobunaga Oda become trusted allies and create a grand drama that claimed a place in the history of conquerors.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 5: Battle of Nagashino
description: An additional playable scenario, "Battle of Nagashino". Following Shingen's death, Nobunaga senses an opportunity to strike at the Takeda clan. In this age of uncertainty, heroes are made and legends are born.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 3: Dawn of Revolution
description: An additional playable scenario, "Dawn of Revolution". This scenario centers around Nobunaga's grand plan to unite the land, and the historical drama that it ignited.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 2: God of War Descends
description: An additional playable scenario, "The God of War Descends". The soon to be War God, Kenshin Uesugi, was born Kagetora Nagao, and he starts his career now. Enjoy this historical drama of the first days of a young hero.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 7: Battle of Tetorigawa
description: An additional playable scenario, "Battle of Tetorigawa". Nobunaga Oda, in an attempt to seize control of the land, comes face to face with the honorable Kenshin Uesugi. This is the story of men who followed their ambitions to the bitter end.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 9: Shingen's Final Step
description: An additional playable scenario, "Shingen's Final Step". The time has finally arrived for the Takeda Army, reputedly the strongest in the land, to march upon the capital. Shingen's illness has healed, and he is no longer uncertain of what he desires.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 4: Fateful Clash
description: An additional playable scenario, "Fateful Clash". After the Incident at Honnoji, chaos reigns once more, and heroes from across the land vie for power.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 6: Battle of Itsukushima
description: An additional playable scenario, "The Battle of Itsukushima". This scenario centers around the great strategist Motonari Mori, and the time he made his move. This is the story of men who dreamed of conquest, and risked their lives.

name: Wargame: European Escalation - Fatal Error
description: "Fatal Error", the 4th free DLC for Wargame: European Escalation, brings you a brand new 5-mission long Operation, as well as a new and finely tuned multi-touch gameplay for owners of Ultrabook with touch display. Inspired by Intel! This DLC focuses on solo play, adding a brand new fifth operation to Wargame's existing four.

name: Wargame: European Escalation - New Battlefields
description: "New Battlefields" for Wargame: European Escalation brings new, free content to all Commanders!Willing to test your Clan's newest tactics? Or to just have some quick fun with friends without pressure? Team up with other players and jump into the action against a computer controlled opponent!

name: Wargame: European Escalation - Conquest
description: "Conquest" for Wargame: European Escalation brings brand new exciting content to extend the conflict. Defy commanders worldwide in the brand new multiplayer mode: Conquest. To be victorious in this mode, in addition to the classic Command Points, you will have to control Victory Sectors (VS) located on the map, until the victory...

name: Covid: Survive the PlanDemic
description: A vaccine creates the undead. Survive, search for a cure, and endure waves of zombies.

name: Viking Trickshot: Full Game
description: Viking Trickshot's free base game includes: 20+ single player levels; 25+ two player levels; 2 core mechanics; unlimited online/local multiplayer. The full game adds: 70+ 1 and 2P levels (combined); many new crazy characters and mechanics; more achievements to unlock. Includes any updates, forever.

name: VR Wonderland: mini civilizations in a forest
description: This game will satisfy your fantasy. You will become a man/woman smaller than a rabbit, going through time and space through a magical stone door, and come to the mini-world island.

name: Memory Card Monsters: Expanded Content 7
description: Finding pairs might sound easy, but this game will definitely challenge your brain! Train your memory, concentration, accuracy, attention, the speed of thinking and logic skills and much more. This game is a great way to exercise your memory and keep your brain fit!

name: Memory Card Monsters: Expanded Content 3
description: Finding pairs might sound easy, but this game will definitely challenge your brain! Train your memory, concentration, accuracy, attention, the speed of thinking and logic skills and much more. This game is a great way to exercise your memory and keep your brain fit!

name: Memory Card Monsters: Expanded Content 6
description: Finding pairs might sound easy, but this game will definitely challenge your brain! Train your memory, concentration, accuracy, attention, the speed of thinking and logic skills and much more. This game is a great way to exercise your memory and keep your brain fit!
